text: Cedric Burgers (born 16 April 1970) is a Canadian rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Canada Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Vancouver
title: Cedric Burgers
